title: Best Prime Day Apple Deals Still Available: Snag Discounts on AirPods, iPads and More
description: There's still time to get a good discount on an Apple product with these post-Prime Day deals. However, the clock is ticking, so you'll want to act fast.
author: Oliver Haslam
excerpt: There's still time to get a good discount on an Apple product with these post-Prime Day deals. However, the clock is ticking, so you'll want to act fast.
text: Why You Can Trust CNET Our expert deal-hunting staff showcases the best price drops and discounts from reputable sellers daily. html:
Why You Can Trust CNET

Our expert deal-hunting staff showcases the best price drops and discounts from reputable sellers daily. If you make a purchase using our links, CNET may earn a commission.

There's still time to get a good discount on an Apple product with these post-Prime Day deals. However, the clock is ticking, so you'll want to act fast.

Oliver Haslam has been writing about phones, computers, games, and anything else that takes a battery or plugs in for more than he'd like to admit. With a focus on mobile and laptops, Oliver is never too far away from whatever social network is trending today and is never short of an opinion to share.

Expertise Apple, phones, laptops, smartwatches, mobile accessories, gaming, apps

Amazon's October Prime Day sale is over, but the sales haven't. Quite a few Apple gadgets are still on sale, not only at Amazon but also at retailers like Best Buy and Walmart. Act soon, though, as prices are starting to return to normal and some products have already sold out. If you've been waiting on an Apple upgrade or trying to get a head start on your holiday shopping, now's the time to buy. We're continuing to round up the best Apple deals worth putting in your cart post-Prime Day.

Hey, did you know? CNET Deals texts are free, easy and save you money.

Prime Day Live Blog

Don't miss our live, round-the-clock coverage of the Best Prime Day Deals curated by CNET Deals experts.

See now

Below, you'll find all the absolute best Apple deals and discounts still available, including deals on accessories. 

Best post-Prime Day deals on Apple products

Here are the main extended Prime Day Apple deals to check out:

  • Apple AirPods Pro (2nd gen, USB-C): $190 (save $59)
  • Apple AirPods Max: $395 (save $154)
  • Apple AirPods (2nd gen): $89 (save $40)
  • M3 Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro 512GB: $1,799 (save $200)
  • Apple AirTags (4-pack): $80 (save $19)

Here's a more detailed breakdown of all the current Apple sales, including the items highlighted above. 

Best post-Prime Day Apple headphones and speakers deals

If you have an iPhone, iPad or MacBook -- or all three -- AirPods are some of the best earbuds you can buy and work with any Apple product. They have excellent audio quality and great features, like active noise cancellation and transparency mode, and they're the most convenient Bluetooth earbuds for Apple users because they pair and connect across your devices. All you have to do is put them in your ears and start using the device you want to connect them to. The earbuds should connect immediately, sort of like magic.

Apple's latest-generation AirPods Pro come with a USB-C charging case, improved ANC and more. You can look forward to long-lasting battery life and a whole lot more from the best wireless earbuds that Apple's selling as part of the Prime Day event.

  • Apple AirPods (2nd gen): $89 (save $40)
  • Apple AirPods 4: $119 (save $10)
  • Apple AirPods 4 (with ANC): $169 (save $10)
  • Apple AirPods (3rd gen): $130 (save $39)
  • Apple AirPods Max: $395 (save $154)
  • Beats Studio Buds: $80 (save $70)
  • Beats Powerbeats Pro: $150 (save $100)
  • Beats Studio Pro: $170 (save $180)
  • Beats Pill (2024): $100 (save $50)

Best post-Prime Day Apple Watch deals

The Apple Watch is the go-to smartwatch option for iPhone users, and there are various models to choose from, from the most recent Apple Watch Series 10 and Apple Watch Ultra 2 to the affordable Apple Watch SE. 

Although the Apple Watch Series 10 has been on shelves for only a few weeks, Amazon is already offering some slight savings on Apple's latest smartwatch. The biggest discount being offered right now is $23 off the 42mm rose gold variant, but you can find other variants on sale as well.

  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 (black): $735 (save $64)
  • Apple Watch SE (2nd gen) GPS 40mm sport loop: $220 (save $79)
  • Apple Watch Series 10 (gold titanium with gold Milanese loop): $760 (save $39)
  • Apple Watch Series 9 GPS (gold stainless steel with Milanese loop): $649 (save $100)
  • Apple Watch Series 9 GPS 45mm (midnight): $349 (save $80)
  • Apple Watch Series 9 GPS 41mm (midnight): $299 (save $100)

Best post-Prime Day Apple iPad deals

The iPad has grown a lot in recent years, and it's now much more than just a screen on which you watch Netflix. It's even a laptop replacement for many people. Now you can pick up an iPad Air, iPad Mini or a standard iPad with a discount, so choose the one that best suits your needs.

This small tablet packs a lot of power, and it's available now at a significant discount from its list price of $499. While this model was released a few years ago, it might make the perfect mid-size tablet for when you want something bigger than a phone but smaller than a laptop or full-sized iPad.

  • 11-inch M2 iPad Air 128GB (Wi-Fi): $549 (save $50)
  • 9th-gen 10.2-inch iPad Air 64GB (Wi-Fi): $199 (save $130)
  • 10th-gen 10.9-inch iPad 64GB (Wi-Fi): $299 (save $50)
  • 13-inch M2 iPad Air 128GB (Wi-Fi): $749 (save $50)

Best post-Prime Day Apple MacBook deals

If you're looking for a new laptop for work or school, some nice post-Prime Day savings are available on Apple laptops. Whether it's a MacBook Air or a MacBook Pro, you'll get a fast and portable machine with a discount.

Featuring a 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR display and the fast M3 Pro chip, this MacBook Pro will handle pretty much anything you can throw at it. It comes with 18GB of RAM and a speedy 512GB SSD. Right now, you can save an impressive $200 on it.

  • M1 13-inch MacBook Air 256GB: $649 (save $50)
  • M3 15-inch MacBook Air 256GB: $1,050 (save $249 with instant coupon)
  • M3 13-inch MacBook Air 256GB: $899 (save $200)
  • M3 14-inch MacBook Pro 1TB: $1,699 (save $300)

Best post-Prime Day Apple accessories deals

Apple accessories aren't always the cheapest around, but they're almost always excellent quality. Fans of Apple's keyboards and trackpads should definitely take a look below, while the Apple Studio Display is worth considering with a $250 discount right now.

If you lose your keys a lot or can never quite remember where that wallet went, a Bluetooth item tracker can be a real lifesaver. The Apple AirTag is among the best taggers, and right now you can get four of them for $80.

If you only need one, a single Apple AirTag can be purchased for $25 with a $4 saving available.

  • Apple AirTag: $25 (save $4)
  • Apple Pencil (2nd gen): $80 (save $49)
  • Apple Studio Display: $1,349 (save $250)
  • Apple Silicone case for iPhone XS Max (midnight blue): $15 (save $17)
  • Apple Magic Keyboard with numeric keypad: $112 (save $17)
  • Apple Magic Trackpad: $110 (save $19)
  • Apple HomePod (2nd gen): $279 (save $20)
  • Apple 20-watt USB-C power adapter: $15 (save $4)
  • Apple 35-watt dual USB-C compact power adapter: $40 (save $19)
  • Apple USB-C to Lightning cable (2 meters): $24 (save $5)
  • Apple MagSafe Charger: $27 (save $12)
  • Apple Magic Mouse: $67 (save $12)
  • Apple iPhone 16 case: $30 (save $19 with APPLEFIVE coupon)

Does Apple offer post-Prime Day sales?

It's important to note that while the Apple Store doesn't run sales for October Prime Day (and rarely offers discounts outside of educational promos), it is possible to find deals on Apple devices and accessories from authorized retailers, which includes Amazon. The best deals usually accompany big events like Amazon Prime Day or a major holiday, and there are plenty of competitive anti-Prime Day sales where you can find discounted Apple products, including Best Buy and Walmart, making it an excellent time to shop for Apple sales on several devices. And once those sales have officially ended, there are usually some lingering deals still up for grabs. If you're looking to spend less, try foregoing the latest releases. You'll find bigger discounts on previous-generation models or refurbished devices. 

Watch this: How to Hack Amazon Prime Day: Shopping and Deals Advice

04:03

How does CNET select the best October Prime Day deals?

Our team of expert shoppers and deal hunters has spent years helping buyers understand which major sales and deals are legitimately good and which are more routine. That includes Black Friday, Prime Day, Memorial Day and countless other shopping events. We've gotten very good at weeding out scams and superficial deals on tech of every kind, so you see only the best offers, including Apple deals. 

At CNET we look for real discounts, quality reviews and remaining sale time when choosing a deal to show you. 

  • Real discounts mean exactly that. We look at the price history for that product to make sure no manufacturers are inflating prices to make the discount seem more substantial than it is.
  • Quality reviews are important for any product, but especially for deeply discounted items. Upgrading your tech can be a big investment, and the discount won't be worthwhile if you don't get enough mileage out of it. 
  • Remaining sale time is a huge part of our vetting process. If a deal is likely short-lived or limited to remaining stock, we'll let you know upfront -- so you're not disappointed if you check back later and find it's gone.

Extend Amazon Prime Day Savings With These Shopping Tips

See all photos

When do Prime Day Apple deals end? 

Prime Day ended at 11:59 p.m. PT on Oct. 9, but there are some lingering deals you can still grab before they disappear completely.
